attributes.action: Stop the 4point pip assessment plan & cuts to disabled legacy benefits ESA etc.
attributes.additional_details:
This change WILL deny many  access to the daily living component of pip, We need to  raise our voices loudly to keep fighting on  behalf of all vulnerable people .
It is NOT acceptable to target a vulnerable & Disabled. 
This is how we help ourselves & those that cannot fight for themselves.
We did not ask to be chronically ill or Disabled ,
We just need surport.

WE NEED TO BE HEARD.



Please, sign this petition now, please sign for the chronically ill, sign for fairness, and sign for justice.
attributes.background:
The Government has purposes a MINIMUM score of 4 points in at least ONE daily living activity to keep or award  new claims & review ongoing assessments from 2026. 

We need 100,000 signatures and then this (legally) must be discussed in parliament.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
